vlive.korean: 확연히 달라. It's completely different. 듣기 View video DAY6 : DAY6 1st Anniversary "데식이들 돌잔치"
제가 확연히 작았어요. I was obviously smaller. 듣기 View video V COOKIE : [Full] Block B​ X Happiness Train - 블락비​의 행복행!

examples.korean: Don’t tempt thieves by leaving valuables clearly visible. 발음듣기 귀중품들을 확연히 눈에 띄게 두어서 도둑들을 유혹하지[부추기지] 않도록 하라. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Don’t tempt thieves by leaving valuables clearly visible. 발음

examples.korean: to walk with a slight/pronounced limp 발음듣기 다리를 약간/확연히 절며 걷다 Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: to walk with a slight/pronounced limp 발음

examples.korean: He walked with a pronounced limp. 발음듣기 그는 확연히 드러나게 절뚝거리며 걸었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He walked with a pronounced limp. 발음

examples.korean: Eddie is, by some distance, the funniest character in the show. 발음듣기 에디는 그 쇼에서 확연히 차이가 나게 가장 우스운 인물이다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Eddie is, by some distance, the funniest character in the show. 발음

examples.korean: The fact that he didn’t speak a foreign language put him at a distinct disadvantage. 발음듣기 외국어를 할 줄 모른다는 사실이 그를 확연히 불리하게 했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The fact that he didn’t speak a foreign language put him at a distinct disadvantage. 발음
